aniVue.title: AniVue
aniVue.description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of anime with AniVue. This cinematic portal offers a vast library of Japanese animation, featuring personalized recommendations and a sleek, user-friendly interface. Experience the future of anime streaming.

comicSphere.title: ComicSphere
comicSphere.description: Empower your comic vision with ComicSphere, a comprehensive platform for digital comic creation and distribution. From intuitive design tools to community engagement features, ComicSphere provides everything you need to bring your comic dreams to life and share them with the world.

work.responsibility1: Develop and maintain web applications using modern technologies
work.responsibility2: Implement responsive designs and optimize application performance
work.responsibility3: Participate in code reviews and mentor junior developers

education1.description: Currently learning stuff, focusing on software engineering and web technologies
